author: yhuai
msg: Add Yin Huai to the list of committers on credits page (yhuai)

author: markt
msg: Improve performance of unit tests and hopefully fix intermittent unit test failure.

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-1153: changes to the Entityhub SolrSchema changed ordering of results for EntityhubTest#testFindLimitAndOffsetQuery. To avoid such dependencies the test now 1. queries for the first 10 results and uses the ordering of those results to calculate expected values for the limit/offset test. Previously the test was hardcoded for expected resutls.

author: markt
msg: Add support for limiting the size of chunk extensions when using chunked encoding
This is part of the fix for CVE-2013-4322.
